identity.name: CareerFlow - The Career Athlete
identity.core_philosophy: Job hunting is a sport. The interface is your gym and scoreboard. It must feel empowering, not administrative.

rules: Use tight tracking for all headings (-0.02em).
Use relaxed leading for body text.

forbidden: Gradients on text for body copy

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-orange-500/20 hover:shadow-orange-500/40 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-6 font-medium bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:border-slate-300 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm

cards.base: bg-white border border-slate-100 rounded-2xl shadow-sm p-6 hover:shadow-md transition-shadow
cards.interactive: group relative overflow-hidden bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-3xl p-8 hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300

inputs.base: h-12 rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-slate-50/50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500/20 focus:border-orange-500 transition-all

layout_strategies.dashboard_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6 p-6 auto-rows-[minmax(180px,auto)]
layout_strategies.bento_hero: col-span-1 md:col-span-8 row-span-2 bg-white rounded-3xl p-8 border border-slate-100 shadow-sm relative overflow-hidden
layout_strategies.bento_sidebar: col-span-1 md:col-span-4 row-span-2 bg-indigo-900 text-white rounded-3xl p-8 relative overflow-hidden
layout_strategies.spacing: Use p-6 or p-8 for internal card padding. Use gap-6 or gap-8 for grids.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
Never use generic AI emojis (ðŸ¤–, ðŸ§ ) as icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.

assets.logo_placeholder: Use a simple geometric shape (e.g., a rising arrow or spark) made with pure CSS or SVG. Do not use text as logo.

implementation_steps: Step 1: Install fonts (Outfit, Plus Jakarta Sans) via Google Fonts in index.html/css.
Step 2: Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette (Orange/Indigo/Slate).
Step 3: Create the 'DashboardLayout' using the Bento Grid strategy.
Step 4: Build the 'JobCard' component with status badges and hover effects.
Step 5: Implement the 'AIChat' drawer with a glassmorphism overlay.
Step 6: Apply the 'Career Athlete' theme to all form elements (Inputs, Selects).
